title: Blended and Flipped Learning-Based Science Competency Enhancement Course: Learner Autonomy Improvement Strategies

context.prior_knowledge: Advanced expertise in scientific disciplines and basic digital literacy
context.additional_context: Customized science education for employees, utilizing real-time collaboration tools and job-integrated content.

learning_goals: Learners can independently complete 80% or more of online materials (videos, readings) in advance in blended learning environments
Learners demonstrate critical thinking and autonomy by presenting three or more case studies applying scientific concepts during discussions in flipped learning classes
Learners improve their ability to revise learning plans by 70% or more through feedback-based formative assessments (quizzes, peer evaluations)
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
